document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-01
document.heading: CONTINUATION OF MORATORIUM ON THE CONVERSION OF ANY MOBILEHOME PARK CURRENTLY EXISTING IN THE CITY FROM A PARK OCCUPIED PRIMARILY OR EXCLUSIVELY BY RESIDENTS OVER THE AGE OF 55 YEARS (SENIOR RESIDENTS) TO A MOBILEHOME PARK ALLOWING RESIDENTS OF ALL AGES
